Title: Relates to the payment of portions of certain settlement funds to the state's general debt service fund
Summary: Relates to the payment of 5% of settlement funds totaling $1,000,000 or more to the principal balance of the state's general debt service fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง72, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the payment of portions of certain settlement funds to the state's general debt service fund
